about_the_game:
The handsome teenage protagonist (which would be you by the way) finds a dating app and intends to exude his charisma and date a girl on the app - as it should be, but the girl who appears at the date is his classmate?

If this has piqued your interest, look no further and consider adding this game to your wishlist! We appreciate it a lot!



Introduction
It's Hasegawa-san!? is a short yet interesting visual novel with a high school romance theme. The game is played in a similar way you would a generic visual novel, of which some scenes will have some interaction available by using the mouse.

Game Type
This game is a text adventure (AVG) game.
The game is played in a similar way you would a generic visual novel, of which some scenes will have some interaction available by using the mouse.

Features
Gorgeous anime-esque CG art
Well-composed music
Heroine is fully voiced throughout the game (CV: Satou Temari)
Join us as the game tells a short story of a boy-meets-girl "coincidental encounter with a female classmate".

In this game, you play as the protagonist who has used a shady dating app, to meet a total stranger in person and date her - at least that's what it should have been, but somehow, the girl who appeared is actually a fellow classmate?
Is it really okay to tell her the real purpose of using this dating app? And why would she use it as well?

You might just find out the answer you seek in the game.



In this new game we have tried a new attempt which is adding the dragging interactive feature. This is something new to us, therefore we appreciate it if you give us feedback no matter positive or negative so we can continue to grow and get better!

The total length of the game is expected to be around 40 minutes. (Less than 2 hours tops, to be honest QwQ)
We sincerely hope you have fun trying this game out!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

All characters involved are over the age of 22.

name: It's Hasegawa-san!?

subs.option_text: 竟然是长谷川同学 - $1.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows xp/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: I tried using a suspicious dating app with the intention of taking a chance to date some girl, but what I didn't expect is that the girl who came was the usually honest and serious classmate of mine...?
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
